message:
I know RequireJS. I've heard of Grunt a lot lately. But this is just too quick.
I understand that Grunt is a Task Runner. Maybe it's used to run tests. But can someone explain what it is exactly. Other real life examples are much appreciated.
http://www.100percentjs.com/just-like-grunt-gulp-browserify-now/
